name: Tour of Colton
description:
The little robot Colton has to escape the Tofu factory to regain control of... well, that's about it in regards to the story. We have no idea where those monsters came from, but beware and don't fall into the holes in the ground.

Some areas in the factory break the little robot's remote control (their antenna hurts a little). In these places, they'll just continue on and wait for you to regain control on the other side.

This game was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020, themed "Out of control". We scrabbled those words a little, and this is what we came up with.
